name: Introduce a new issue to create trade space
summary: Add a new negotiable issue (timing, risk, scope, service level) to enable value-creating trades when stuck on one point.
goal: Unlock agreement by creating more degrees of freedom.
counterparty_guidance: Assess scope creep and ask why the issue appears now.
Decide whether to bundle, park, or trade for the new issue.
If accepted, link it to a concession from their side.
Avoid expanding the deal without protection.
